name: flashback
title: Flashback
description: Helps you record what you have been doing so you can have a timeline of notes you did throughout the day
author: youscef

commands.name: capture
commands.title: capture
commands.description: capture a new note to your timeline

commands.name: timeline
commands.title: timeline
commands.description: shows you your time line to edit add or delete nodes from the time

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
